txt.en: Servants of the White Hand are on the move in this part of the forest
The White Hand roams in Fangorn, polluting and corrupting all that it touches. The servants of Saruman should be slain, to the very last.
The White Hand roams in Fangorn, polluting and corrupting all that it touches. The servants of Saruman should be slain, to the very last.
You find a pond with Orcs and Uruks roaming around, on the move in Fangorn on some errand from Isengard.
You have done well to abate the spread of Saruman's most destructive forces in Fangorn, but the damage cannot be undone. This was an act of revenge, and revenge alone.
Servants of the White Hand encircle the pond near Oldheart's meadow, polluting the western edge of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should destroy the hideous servants of the White Hand that harry the forest.
You have done well to abate the spread of Saruman's most destructive forces in Fangorn, but the damage cannot be undone. This was an act of revenge, and revenge alone.
